seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'AI Data Engineer' without senior/junior modifier, 1+ years experience, collaborating with senior AI developer suggests not senior level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly 'AI Data Engineer', core focus on AI/ML model deployment, monitoring, and infrastructure rather than traditional data engineering

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on AI/ML model training, deployment on Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, and infrastructure for AI workflows

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, mentoring, or team leadership; collaborating with senior AI developer suggests individual contributor role

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple Azure services explicitly mentioned: Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, Azure DevOps, Azure services

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only Azure services mentioned, no other cloud providers referenced

processing_paradigm.evidence: AI model training (batch processing) combined with model deployment and monitoring (potentially real-time), automation workflows

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps and Microsoft Fabric mentioned as orchestration tools, both are cloud-native Azure services

storage_layer.evidence: Microsoft Fabric suggests data warehouse capabilities, while AI/ML workflows often involve data lake patterns for model training data

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid work model with Prague office location, requires being in Prague metro area (Palmovka metro station mentioned)

timezone_focus.evidence: Prague, Czechia location with Czech/Slovak language requirement suggests European timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model allows flexibility, no mention of relocation assistance or requirements

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, Czech/Slovak language requirement suggests local/EU candidates preferred

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, language requirements suggest work authorization in Czechia/EU required

citizenship_required.evidence: Czech/Slovak fluency required suggests work authorization in Czechia needed, but no explicit citizenship requirement

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time position with comprehensive benefits package suggests traditional employment (W2 equivalent in Czechia)

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits: 5 weeks vacation, meal allowance, pension contributions, insurance, training, certifications, multisport card, flexible hours

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions focus on development, internal/external trainings, certifications, workshops, and continuous learning opportunities

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaborating with senior AI developer mentioned, part of developing AI Competence Center suggests learning from experienced team

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit promotion or advancement path mentioned, focus is on skill development and training

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: Focus on technical skills development, AI/ML expertise building suggests IC track, no management track mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-haves (Python, SQL, Azure, 1+ years) and nice-to-haves (Computer Vision), balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused AI Data Engineer role with specific responsibilities: data prep, model deployment, automation, clear scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Reasonable skill requirements for 1+ years experience: Python, SQL, Azure services, AI model experience aligns with mid-level expectations
